# 4.1 Different priors, different posteriors


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Import data
data(bechdel, package = "bayesrules")

# Take a sample of 20 movies
set.seed(84735)
bechdel_20 <- bechdel %>% 
  sample_n(20)

bechdel_20 %>% 
  head(3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

3  2013 The Purge  FAIL  
```

  adorn_totals("row")
